title: The Great Canadian shield
creator_credit: Laurence Hyde and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The rock of the great Canadian Shield was formed two billion years ago. Now its many minerals—gold, nickel, copper, mica, feldspar, iron and magnesium—are mined as essential ingredients in Canadian industry.
creator_credit_for_label: Laurence Hyde and National Film Board of Canada
